org.genthz.context

Interface ContextFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DashaContextFactory

    public interface ContextFactory
    This class contains several methods for context creation.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    mathter

      Method like to single(Class, Type...) but create new context with specific Bindings.
      default <T> InstanceContext<T> single(Class<T> type, Type... genericArgTypes)
      Method returns InstanceContext for specified type and genericArgTypes.

    • Method Detail

      • single

        default <T> InstanceContext<T> single(Class<T> type,
                                      Type... genericArgTypes)
                               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Method returns InstanceContext for specified type and genericArgTypes.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of class.
        Parameters:
        type - class of the new object.
        genericArgTypes - generic arguments for parametrized class.
        Returns:
        context.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if genericArgTypes do not matched to type.

      • single

        <T> InstanceContext<T> single(Bindings bindings,
                              Class<T> type,
                              Type... genericArgTypes)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Method like to single(Class, Type...) but create new context with specific Bindings.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of class.
        Parameters:
        bindings - predefined bindings for new context.
        type - class of the new object.
        genericArgTypes - generic arguments for parametrized class.
        Returns:
        context.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if genericArgTypes do not matched to type.

      • byConstructor

        <T> List<NodeInstanceContext<?,Integer>> byConstructor(InstanceContext<T> up,
                                                       Constructor constructor)
        Method returns List of the contexts corresponds to the parameters of the constructor.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the class.
        Parameters:
        up - parent context.
        constructor - constructor.
        Returns:
        list of the contexts.

      • byCollection

        <T extends Collection,E> List<NodeInstanceContext<E,Integer>> byCollection(InstanceContext<T> up,
                                                                           int count)
        Method returns List the contexts for elements of collection.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the collection.
        E - type of the collection elements.
        Parameters:
        up - parent context for collection.
        count - count of collection elements.
        Returns:
        list of the contexts.

        T - type of the java array.
        E - type of the array elements.
        Parameters:

        count - count of collection elements.
        Returns:
